SongName: Don't Be So Hard On Yourself (Hibell Remix)
Album: Don't Be So Hard On Yourself (Hibell Remix)
Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:11.58]I came here with a broken heart that no one else could see
[00:15.56]I drew a smile on my face to paper over me
[00:19.44]The wounds heal and tears dry and cracks they don't show
[00:23.27]So don't be so hard on yourself, no
[00:27.60]Let's go back to simplicity
[00:29.59]I feel like I've been missing me
[00:31.23]Was not who I'm supposed to be
[00:33.42]I felt this darkness over me
[00:35.17]We all get there eventually
[00:37.12]I never knew where I belonged
[00:39.26]But I was right and you were wrong
[00:41.20]Been telling myself all along
[00:43.05]
[00:58.94]Don't be so hard on yourself, no
[01:14.75]Don't be so hard on yourself, no
[01:30.36]Don't be so hard on yourself, no
[01:51.30]Oh, Oh, Oh, I
[01:54.51]I learned to wave goodbye
[01:58.49]How not to see my life
[02:02.37]Through someone else's eyes
[02:06.40]It's not an easy road
[02:10.19]But now I'm not alone
[02:14.27]So I, I won't be so hard on myself no more
[02:37.21]Don't be so hard on yourself, no
[02:52.75]Don't be so hard on yourself, no
[03:08.88]Don't be so hard on yourself, no
